entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 03:00 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: -0.6°C
Wind: S 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow or rain or ice pellets changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers or ice pellets overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or ice pellets. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with drizzle. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
